fomod.Name: Estrus Dwemer
fomod.Author: Ed86
fomod.Description:
Requirements: Estrus Chaurus+ v4.34 and its prerequisites http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1033-estrus-chaurus/
Optional(Sexlab animations for dwemer automatons sexing): SexLab Animation Loader https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/2488-sexlab-animation-loader/ SLAL_Billyy_Creature2 https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3999-billyys-slal-animations/ or other animation pack that adds dwarwen animations
